===Noun===
{{ja-noun|てっぽう}}

# [[gun]]
# {{lb|ja|Kansai|slang|sort=てっぽう}} [[pufferfish]], {{ja-r|河豚|ふぐ}}, punning on {{ja-r|当たる|gloss=poisoned or shot|あたる}}. I.e., a pufferfish is something that can poison you, just as a gun is something that can shoot you.
